title: Cache thumbnail images
description: Thumbnails are currently fetched multiple times per sessions.

title: Delete photo clubs
description: Deletion of the Test photo clubs (and others), including their membership list. Photographers in Who's Who page are not deleted.

title: Maps
description: Add names of clubs to pins. Maybe show user's current location.

title: Index of Clubs
description: Host JSON file with photo clubs (name and URL) on a server. Allows clubs to be added/removed without updating software.

title: Rename app
description: Change app name from Photo Club Waalre to something not associated with any single club.

title: Support club expositions
description: Present images shown at a club exposition as a Portfolio. This could be reachable from either the Portfolios page, or the Photo Clubs page.

title: Support onboarding of clubs without any code changes.
description: This is probably essential to get widespread adoption across photo clubs. 'Index of Clubs' is part of this.

title: Notifications for new images
description: Show using a badge/dot that a portfolio has been updated. Sounds/alerts would be opt-in, if supported at all.
